name: wayfarer-master
description: WayFarer is a public bus transportation booking server

scripts.test: set NODE_ENV=test && npm run seeder && mocha -r @babel/register -r @babel/polyfill server/tests/*.js --exit && npm run rollback
scripts.localTest: set NODE_ENV=test && npm run testSeeder && mocha -r @babel/register -r @babel/polyfill server/tests/*.js --exit && npm run rollback
scripts.devstart: set NODE_ENV=development && npm run seeder && babel-watch server/app.js
scripts.start: set NODE_ENV=production && npm run migrate && node server/bin/dev
scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir dist && babel server -s -d dist
scripts.insert: npm run insertUsers && npm run insertBuses && npm run insertBookings && npm run insertTrips
scripts.testInsert: npm run insertTestUsers && npm run insertTestBuses && npm run insertTestBookings && npm run insertTestTrips
scripts.seeder: npm run build && npm run rollback && npm run create-tables && npm run insert
scripts.testSeeder: npm run build && npm run rollback && npm run create-tables && npm run testInsert
scripts.coverage: nyc npm test && npm run generate-lcov && npm run coveralls-coverage && npm run codeclimate-coverage

author: Victor Awotidebe
